author: Tom Kertscher
statement: “If I don’t take the vaccine, I’m at risk for covid. If I do take the vaccine, I’m still at risk for covid PLUS I’m at risk for permanent vaccine side effects. Therefore I’m reducing my risk by not taking the vaccine. That’s the real science.”

author: Jon Greenberg
statement: Calls COVID-19 vaccine a “non-FDA-approved experimental agent.”

author: Gabrielle Settles
statement: A map shows “all the cargo ships backed up by the Suez Canal. Get ready for shortages and prices to skyrocket.”

author: Noah Y.
statement: Says H.R. 1 gives immigrants illegally in the country “the right to vote.”

author: Andy Nguyen
statement: “From Europe: 3,964 people have died from adverse drug reactions for COVID-19 ‘vaccines’ – 162,610 injuries.”

author: Louis Jacobson
statement: If the voting bill H.R. 1 is passed, “absentee ballots would be mailed out to anyone without proof of the voter’s identity.”

author: Amy Sherman
statement: U.S. Rep. Matt Gaetz was the lone vote in the House against an anti-human trafficking bill.

author: Madison Czopek
statement: Video says COVID-19 vaccines are “weapons of mass destruction” that “could wipe out the human race.”

author: Michael Majchrowicz
statement: Image of expansive pit shows a lithium mine.

author: Samantha Putterman
statement: Says Ben Shapiro said on Twitter that his “red pill moment” was sharing cupcakes with poor kids.

author: Tom Kertscher
statement: “Joe Biden puts pro-life groups on domestic extremist list, calls pro-life people ‘violent.’”

author: Amy Sherman
statement: Georgia’s new voting law “makes it a JAIL-TIME CRIME to drop off grandma’s absentee ballot in a dropbox.”

author: Jon Greenberg
statement: Says Deborah Birx “traveled a great distance to see her family for Thanksgiving — only to have them call the police and turn her in. She then ... resigned.”

author: Tom Kertscher
statement: “Minority farmers get big bonus, white ones get none,” because of Democrats.

author: Samantha Putterman
statement: The ship that was stuck in the Suez Canal was a planned or staged event.

author: Bill McCarthy
statement: Says Rachel Levine was Time magazine's "Woman of the Year."

author: Noah Y.
statement: Nostradamus predicted that a “feeble man” would rule the “Western World” after a time of “plague.”

author: Madison Czopek
statement: Says Sen. Cory Booker wants to require a federal license for gun owners but criticizes voter ID laws as discriminatory.

author: Eric Litke
statement: Judge Jeff Davis "spent years defending a convicted cop killer" and "tried to get him off the hook."

author: Warren Fiske
statement: “There is no discernible difference between the spread and deaths of COVID in Virginia than there is in Florida.”

author: Tom Kertscher
statement: “Less than 500 people a year killed by all rifles combined” and “4,000 a year killed by illegals.”

author: Tom Kertscher
statement: Says the suspected Boulder mass shooter is a Muslim "who entered illegally from Mexico and purchased the firearm from a guy that sells stolen guns."

author: Bill McCarthy
statement: “Toxicology report was made public by the MN prosecution revealing the cause of George Floyd’s death was a fentanyl overdose.”

author: Gabrielle Settles
statement: Says Jimmy Kimmel, Jimmy Fallon and Stephen Colbert are “still not doing Biden jokes."

author: Samantha Putterman
statement: Says Google Earth blocked people from seeing the Suez Canal.

author: Miriam Valverde
statement: “We spent billions on a border wall and quit when it was 90% finished.”

author: Amy Sherman
statement: A Georgia law has not “criminalized giving people bottles of water.” It pertains to political organizations.

author: Louis Jacobson
statement: "There are 43 states that have now passed voter suppression laws."

author: Paul Specht
statement: "Joe Biden forced the U.S. Attorney for the Eastern District of North Carolina to resign after 24 people were charged with election fraud and the Mainstream Media never even batted an eyelash."

author: Noah Y.
statement: Nike and Lil Nas X are launching “demonic shoes” containing human blood.
